variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-devel-checklib
dependencies.description: Devel::CheckLib - check that a library is available

dependencies.name: perl-test-differences
dependencies.description: Test strings and data structures and show differences if not ok

dependencies.name: perl-test-longstring
dependencies.description: Tests strings for equality, with more helpful failures

dependencies.name: perl-test-warn
dependencies.description: Perl extension to test methods for warnings

dependencies.name: zstd
dependencies.description:
Zstandard, or zstd as short version, is a fast lossless compression
algorithm, targeting real-time compression scenarios at zlib-level and
better compression ratios.
